TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IPropertySheetCallback

summary.span: 將嵌入式管理單元的屬性頁加入至屬性工作表 (Property Sheet)。

span.span: Adds the property pages for the snap-in to a property sheet.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會傳送至這個執行個體 IPropertySheetCallback 介面的指標，讓嵌入式管理單元可以新增或移除屬性頁。The method passes a pointer to this instance of the IPropertySheetCallback interface so that the snap-in can add or remove property pages. 如需有關使用 IPropertySheetCallback 介面和 Microsoft Management Console (MMC) 進行程式設計的詳細資訊，請參閱[MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview)。For more information about programming with the IPropertySheetCallback interface and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void AddPage(native int hPage) cil managed

param.name: hPage
param.span: 要加入至屬性工作表的屬性工作表頁控制代碼。

span.span: The handle to a property sheet page to add to a property sheet.

summary.span: 將頁面加入至屬性工作表。

span.span: Adds a page to a property sheet.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需有關使用程式設計介面和 Microsoft Management Console (MMC)，請參閱 < [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview)。For more information about programming with the interface and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void RemovePage(native int hPage) cil managed

param.name: hPage
param.span: 要從屬性工作表移除的屬性工作表頁控制代碼。

span.span: The handle to a property sheet page to remove from a property sheet.

summary.span: 從屬性工作表移除頁面。

span.span: Removes a page from a property sheet.

remarks.format: ## Remarks RemovePage 方法可以移除嵌入式管理單元已新增的頁面。The RemovePage method can remove only pages that the snap-in has added. 如需有關使用程式設計介面和 Microsoft Management Console (MMC)，請參閱 < [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview)。For more information about programming with the interface and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).
